William Calder

  1. Foster Name: William Wallace
  2. Foster Family: Caroline Thieman
  3. Location of Family: South Bend, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Ashland, NE
  6. Age on Arrival:
  7. Date of Birth: 1883-03-10, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/4/1958, TX
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Emma Calder
  11. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Elmwood Leader Echo (Elmwood, NE), 10 February 1905; 1900 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Woodlawn Cemetery, Houston, TX
